author: tvami
body:
#### PR description:

See https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/38090
Diffs for GTs that are different wrt to 38090

**phase1_2018_cosmics_peak**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts//123X_upgrade2018cosmics_realistic_peak_v1/123X_upgrade2018cosmics_realistic_peak_v2

https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts//123X_mcRun3_2021_design_v14/123X_mcRun3_2021_design_v15

**phase1_2021_realistic**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts//123X_mcRun3_2021_realistic_v14/123X_mcRun3_2021_realistic_v15

**phase1_2024_realistic**

**phase2_realistic**

title: [12_3_X] Add new GEM electronics map to all GTs
